sqlMap.select: SELECT , 1 AS count, content_type, FROM gold_standard b LEFT JOIN review_ratings_cache c ON c.interHash = b.simhash1 WHERE b.simhash1 = #hash# AND b.content_type = #contentType# ORDER BY b.date DESC

SELECT , scraperid, 1 AS count, -1 AS rating, -1 AS number_of_ratings FROM (gold_standard b, gold_standard_publication_references r) WHERE r.publication = #hash# AND b.simhash1 = r.reference ORDER BY b.title DESC

SELECT , scraperid, 1 AS count, -1 AS rating, -1 AS number_of_ratings FROM (gold_standard b, gold_standard_publication_references r) WHERE r.reference = #hash# AND b.simhash1 = r.publication ORDER BY b.title DESC
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM gold_standard WHERE simhash1 = #hash# AND content_type = #contentType#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO gold_standard_publication_references (publication, reference, user_name) VALUES (#hash#, #refHash#, #username#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM gold_standard_publication_references WHERE publication = #hash# AND reference = #refHash#
